title: MNF Recap; Bizarro Hot Takes
itunes:title: MNF Recap; Bizarro Hot Takes
description:
A room filled with heroes – Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler, Colleen Wolfe & Gregg Rosenthal recap all the latest news from around the NFL including Darren Sproles out for the year and Odell Beckham Jr’s touchdown celebrations. The heroes give their Bizarro hot take predictions for upcoming games and round two of the Subreddit Super Contest continues! Will there be a round 3?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
